title: Pregnant Jenna Dewan holds hands with Steve Kazee
text:
Jenna Dewan is expecting her first child with her American actor boyfriend Steve Kazee and the couple looked very loved up as they enjoyed a stroll on Thursday.

Holding hands, Jenna, 38, wore a patterned jumpsuit, while Steve, 43, wore a leather biker jacket with jeans and boots.

The outing comes as Jenna admitted she was 'blindsided' after discovering that her estranged husband Channing Tatum, 39, was dating Jessie J, 31, - because he didn't warn her first.

Close: Pregnant Jenna Dewan held hands with boyfriend Steve Kazee on an evening stroll in LA on Thursday... after admitting she was 'blindsided' by ex Channing Tatum's romance with Jessie J

Cute: Jenna looked great in her ensemble which had a waist tie - she teamed her look with brown sandals and a red handbag

Jenna looked great in her ensemble which had a waist tie - she teamed her look with brown sandals and a red handbag.

She appeared deep in thought during the evening stroll with her handsome partner, who gazed adoringly at her.

Jenna had already moved on with with boyfriend Steve at the time of Channing's romance with Jessie, but said the news still came as a huge shock to her.

The dancer dished about the experience in her new book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday, per Radaronline.com.

'Finally here': The star revealed she 'felt blindsided' when she learned that her estranged husband, Channing, was with singer Jessie J, in her new book Gracefully You

'There I was, on a plane, alone, finding out about his new relationship,' she wrote. 'I felt blindsided.'

Jenna found out just months after separating from Channing her husband of 10 years with whom she shares daughter Everly, six.

She said Channing didn't give her any advance notice that the news of his relationship with Jessie was about to break.

So she found out at the same time as the rest of the world, which she said was 'difficult.'

New love: Channing seems pretty loved up with British pop star Jessie J , 31

Initially, Jenna said she wrote Tweets about the situation she found herself in. But she opted not to post them. 'Instead of reacting the way I wanted…I asked myself this: How do I choose grace in this moment?' she said.

Jenna and Channing, announced their separation in April 2018 and she filed for divorce in October. Tatum and his new pop star love, Jessie, were seen together that same month - and Jenna had moved on with her beau, actor-singer Steve Kazee, 43,

She and Steve are now expecting their first child together.

New beau: Jenna, 38, and her man, actor-singer Steve, strolled hand in hand in Los Angeles in March

Putting it out there: Jenna failed to cover up her baby bump when she was spotted out in Los Angeles on Monday. She and Steve are expecting their first child together

Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance In The Everyday is available in bookstores and online.

Meanwhile, Jenna is set to host Fox's new Flirty Dancing dating series this winter.

She posted the news on Instagram saying: 'I am so thrilled to be a part of this fun, fresh and crazy heartwarming show! More to come soon!'
description: Jenna Dewan is expecting her first child with her American actor boyfriend Steve Kazee and the couple looked very loved up as they enjoyed a stroll on Thursday.
